verbs.description: Sure , Larry Kudlow [V: has] always been a tool . So it made perfect sense for him to throw away any shred of integrity in his long - held free trade worldview to join with the shallow , ignorant and inane lunatics on Trump ’s trade , economic and foreign policy ...
